name: Baldi's basics christmas bash!
description:
Story: Baldi has invited you to his Christmas party and you decided not to go there BUT GOSH DANG IT your friend has messed up again. He left his Notebooks at the school before he went on christmas break so he has told you to get the Notebooks for him. Careful though there are some familiar faces at the school to slow and annoy you. So good luck.

ATTENTION:

you need to press the right arrow button if there is dialogue.

Credits:

Porky powers for voicing Baldi and filename2

Splinta dina for the Baldi model

super inky for first prize and bully model

xtpsx for the fixed beans script

Feulfire for voicing playtime
